message: Let's start fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can work something out in the future rounds.
You took the lion's share last time, now it's my turn.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but this is still a good deal for both of us. We can't keep going back and forth like this.
I'm not convinced you're willing to give up that much. I'll give you a chance to reconsider.
This is my final offer. We're getting closer to the end, and if we don't agree soon, we'll both lose out. Let's be practical and split the difference.
It's getting late, and I'm not willing to give up the last bit of leverage. Meet me in the middle, or I'll take it all.
